blog.name: ultravioletpandamonium1
blog.title: My_Names_Not_Pinkie_Pie
blog.description: bandito tour, June 28, 2019-Author, Songwriter, always on the verge of a mental breakdown, future Japan resident

title: The Last Lights -  a Continuation
body:
Me: hey... it's been a while. I don't know if you're still here, or if you even care anymore, but why do I try to keep going? I've lost nearly everyone who I held close, and now I'm at war with my own heart. Every night I feel cold, but when I cover up, I grow hot, almost like a fever, I am losing in a battle between my heart and my mind, and I don't know if this is my final day in the light house or not. I'm tired, I'm so tired. I'm tired of being used for everyone's amusement, I'm tired of being the root of every joke, I'm tired of not being taken serious, I'm tired of being treated like a child when I'm about to go in to college, I told my last friend, "I'm tired of being a doormat labeled, "Please, walk all over me and shatter my feelings" 
What will I do, when I no longer can turn to music?
When my lights finally fade, and my final days of happiness come to an end, because in the end, I drive everyone away, there's no hope, no light, nothing. There's just the darkness, and me. When your best friend, who was like a sister, tells you, that you made her suicidal, and that she wanted to harm herself after a fun, happy day at the lake a few blocks down, you begin to wonder what you did wrong, but eventually you come to the conclusion, that you're gullible, a pushover, and an easy target to people who want to break you down. I never did anything to deserve this, I miss the old days, where I could run here and feel comfort.
I don't know if you're here, but please, don't leave me too.
(a long silence before suddenly, the spotlights click on loudly, one by one, they returned.) 
Josh: I'm... so sorry
Tyler: please don't leave again.
Kellin: we love you kid
Andy: we're always there, it may not feel like there's anyone on your side, but that's why we do what we do. To protect kids like you from yourselves.
Gerard: yeah and frankly, life is shit so everyone needs a good Japanese disco party here and there.
(two new spotlights flashed on in the distance, revealing her new lights.)
Billie: sup bitches I'm here on behalf of Maelee, yes hi, oh wow Josh, you're here too? Izza party!
(everyone turned to look behind Billie, looking for the new light.)
Gerard: well someone doesn't belong here
Harry: help I'm surrounded by the people my mum warned me about!
Me, finally breathing: we may be few, but we're proud, and we're emotional. I'll sing it for the boys, girls, and non binary friends, In the end, we're a family. And we're not afraid to die. They say love is forever, but my lights are all I need. When I fall asleep, I'll know where I go, and I can't say I'll ever stop crying, whether its the sign of the times, or a puppy shelter commercial, thank you, all of you.



This is actually really hard for me to write now, it's painful, but I am going to get back in the habit of writing these, it helped so much for my anxiety last time, thanks guys, and I'm going to put tags so everyone else knows you're not alone, because, Gerard loves you, Andy loves you, Kellin loves you, Tyler and Josh love themselves but they also love you, Billie would take a bullet for you if it came down to it, and Harry? Well whether you like Mr. Styles or not, he loves you, but if that didn't help, I love you, so please, please please don't let the darkness take over your heart, do what I did, or something your own way, create a happy place, and breathe your life in to it, because believe me, it's amazing. 

love always, Mae <3

stay alive, |-/ and always stay unique ||-//

stay alive, |-/ and always stay unique ||-//

summary: okay so - the story about self-harming almost made me cry. i used to selfharm a lot and i have the scars to prove it and...
question: okay so - the story about self-harming almost made me cry. i used to selfharm a lot and i have the scars to prove it and sometimes I just really - really - needed a person to tell me I'd be okay. I'm in a better state now, but hearing my dad be mad at me for cutting myself once again or was just as bad as the thoughts that I had. Thank you for portraying the selfharming as an actual disease which is not done for attention seeking. you're a proper angel and I couldn't thank you enough. ♥️🌙
answer:
Thank you for opening up about your experience with self-harm, lovely. It takes a lot to share that information, even anonymously, because it’s admitting the truth not only to others, but to yourself as well.

I’m sorry about how your dad would shout at you. It’s horrible if you intentionally hurt yourself and only get shouted at. Nobody is after attention for serious illnesses like these, (in fact, most people who self-harm cover their injuries out fear, guilt and shame). What we do seek is love, affection, comfort and reassurance. 

It’s important never to romanticise self-harm, but a loved one should be supporting you - wether that be cleaning your wounds, writing lists of things to do instead of self-harm, distracting you, checking in on you. It doesn’t take a lot - and sometimes, even just receiving a text of, “Hey, how are you? I saw your favourite flower today and thought of you,” and if you hear words of a similar effect at the right time, it can stop you from hurting yourself.

Whilst I’m not condoning your dad’s behaviour, and I’m certainly not excusing it, it must be hard for people who love you to see you hurt yourself. They only ever want what’s best and a huge part to play is denial - I suppose parents never want to think that it’s their baby hurting themselves. Maybe they think everyone else around you may suffer from this illness, but you can’t. A big thing is, “you have nothing to be depressed about,” or “you don’t have a reason to be doing that.” The smallest thing can be a catalyst for self-harm or other mental health illness - and we’re all human, we all feel emotion.

The irony is, we live in a society where people will immediately post things for likes on social media, expressing how sad it is that these mental illnesses exist and that people deserve help - yet a lot of them seem to be the exact same people who dismiss their families/friends’ illnesses, not caring about their mental health, and that’s really sad.

Thank you for your kind comments on this piece. I really wanted to express the importance of healthcare, the feelings of those suffering, and the feelings of everyone around that person. I hope this brought some comfort to you - boyfriend!harry making me feel loved, special, and safe, is a must for me some days, too. 

I am so relieved that you are in a better place now - and never forget that yes, relapses happen, but people care about you and love you - and if you need to come online and vent to me, then please do.

blog.name: onedirectionmylifez
blog.title: One Direction
blog.description: Just a simple girl | 1D will come back | they changed my entire life

summary: A Red Rose || Harry Styles’ fanfiction
body:
A Red Rose || Harry Styles’ fanfiction

He stood in front of me, with his green eyes and curly brown hair.

Behind him, a bush of red roses made the perfect background.

At that moment I wanted to paint him, like the most beautiful and important work of art in the world.

Because he is art, all what he do is art.

Then, he caught one rose from the bush and walked towards me.

- Why are you looking at me with that eyes, Mae? - he asked with a smile sourrounded by two dimples.

Harry represented all the cuteness and the beauty in the world.

- ‘Cause I think you’re a work of art - I wishpered, blushing violently.

Then, he took the rose and put it on my hand, caring to not hurt me with its thorns.

- I think that you are the work of art here, instead - his voice made me blush more than previously.

- You are as beautiful as that rose, or more. - he grabbed my waist and put me closer to him, he took my face between his big hands and kissed me on the lips.

He tasted as something really sweet and pungent at the same time.

- I love you - he whispered, holding me like he never did before.

…

A really really short fanfiction but I wanted to write this.

I hope you like that and like or reblog, if you want.❤️
